short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes your web browsing much easier and comfortable by helping you simply read the weather in your city.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the latest weather news and updates right at your homepage!
Enjoy an easy-to-use weather-oriented homepage that keeps you connected and up to date with access to top weather websites from all over the world right from your browser homepage.
Stay up to date with weather while enjoying a rich search experience and social networks shortcuts. 
For easy access, we recommend pinning the extension to your browser toolbar.

By clicking “ADD TO CHROME”, you accept and agree to install the Weather Meter Chrome Extension, set the Chrome™ New Tab to weather-meter.com, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.  

The extension requests the following permission:
- Can read and change your data on sites: 
   https://*. weather-meter.com /* 
  
Terms of Use:  https://weather-meter.com/pages/terms-of-use.html
Privacy Policy:  https://weather-meter.com/pages/privacy-policy.html
About us: https://weather-meter.com/pages/about-us.html
Contact us: https://weather-meter.com/pages/contact.html
 
You may uninstall the extension at any time.
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings.”
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions.”
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall.
